pullrequest.title: spheres links question, dynamically created joints exploading

content.raw: Just giving you heads up on gazebo [style guide](http://gazebosim.org/user_guide/modifying__style.html). Running `tools/code_check.sh` from gazebo src dir should catch some of them. This is mainly needed later when the patch is to be merged back to the default branch
content.html: Just giving you heads up on gazebo style guide. Running tools/code_check.sh from gazebo src dir should catch some of them. This is mainly needed later when the patch is to be merged back to the default branch
